lines.content: * Parses user input into a Command.
* Main class for the Pookie X3 application.
System.out.println("What can I do for you? OwO");
// exit if command is exit command
* Command to add a new task to the task list.
return "Please provide a task to add! >w<";
return "The description of a todo cannot be empty! >w<";
return "Please provide a description and deadline using '/by'! >w<";
return "The description or deadline of the event cannot be empty! >w<";
return "Please provide event description and time using '/from' and '/to'! >w<";
return "The description, from time, and to time of the event cannot be empty! >w<";
return "I don't know the task: " + taskType + ". Please use 'todo', 'deadline', or 'event'. ;w;";
* @return the message to print after execution
* Indicates whether this command should close the application.
* @return true if the command is an exit command, false otherwise
* Command to list all tasks in the task list.
StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("Here are the tasks in your list :3\n");
* Command to mark a task as done.
return "Please provide the index of the task to mark! >w<";
return "Owo? The index provided is not a number! >w<";
return "Nice! I've marked this task as done x3\n  " + task.toString();
* Command to unmark a task as not done.
return "Please provide the index of the task to unmark! >w<";
return "Owo? The index provided is not a number! >w<";
return "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet ;w;\n  " + task.toString();
public EventTask(String description, String from, String to) {
* Represents a generic task with a description and completion status.
* Stores and manages the list of tasks.
private static final Task[] tasks = new Task[100];
* Adds a task to the task list
* @throws IllegalStateException if the task list is full
throw new IllegalStateException("UwU! Task list is full! Cannot add more tasks.");
* Returns the task at the given index
* @param index Index of the task to retrieve
* @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of bounds
throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("That's not a valid index dummy! -w-");
